oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: WSM Radio coverage - Eddy Arnold donation ceremony - 2003-03-06
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM radio coverage of the Eddy Arnold honor and donation ceremony from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March 6, 2003.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddie Stubbs; Jay Orr; Bobby Bare; Brenda Lee; Kyle Young; Cowboy Jack Clement; Suzy Bogguss; Shawn Camp; Billy Burnette; Jim Lauderdale; Bill Denny; John Rumble; Tammy Genovese; Eddy Arnold; Bill Cody; Harold Bradley;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress / (00:00) WSM playlist / (00:46) Opening comments from Eddie Stubbs from the venue / (05:30) WSM plays record of Anytime / (08:21) Eddie Stubbs introduces the opening comments of the program / (09:45) Eddie talks to Jay Orr / (11:30) Eddy Arnold and his wife Sally enter the theater with walk-in music / (13:39) Opening comments by Kyle Young / (18:30) Introduction of Cowboy Jack Clement who comments and introduces Suzy Bogguss who performs Anytime / (23:02) Clement comments and performs I'll Hold You In My Heart (Till I Can Hold You In My Arms) / (26:38) Cowboy Jack introduces the band of Shawn Camp, Billy Burnette, Glenn Rieuf, Dave Roe, Kenny Malone, Bobby Wood / (28:09) Kyle Young continues with program / (29:33) Kyle introduces Shawn Camp who performs You Don't Know Me / (33:30) Cowboy Jack introduces Bobby Bare who comments and performs I Really Don't Want To Know / (38:12) Cowboy Jack introduces Suzy Bogguss who performs Cattle Call /

(42:09) Kyle continues with the program / (45:05) Audio from video presentation / (46:26) Kyle continues with program and introduces Bill Denny who continues with the Eddy Arnold honor / (50:05) Cowboy Jack introduces Jim Lauderdale who comments and performs Make The World Go Away / (54:16) Cowboy Jack introduces Billy Burnette who performs The Tips Of My Fingers / (58:13) Kyle Young continues with the program and introduces Brenda Lee who comments / (01:02:30) John Rumble comments on the donation and shares many items with the audience / (01:10:09) Kyle continues with the program and presents certificate of appreciated to Eddy Arnold / (01:13:15) Kyle Young continues with the program and introduces CMA's Tammy Genovese who comments on Eddy Arnold's impact and his donation / (01:17:00) Genovese introduces Nashville mayor Bill Purcell who honors Eddy Arnold / (01:19:20) Purcell introduces Brenda Lee who comments and presents new Hall of Fame medallion to Eddy Arnold /
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Stubbs, Eddie; Orr, Jay; Bare, Bobby; Lee, Brenda; Young, Kyle; Clement, Jack; Bogguss, Suzy; Camp, Shawn; Burnette, Billy; Lauderdale, Jim; Denny, Bill (J. William); Rumble, John; Genovese, Tammy; Purcell, Bill; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Cody, Bill; Bradley, Harold; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
